short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to bid over the jobs from 24 Writerbay and easy to use.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An exclusive tool to perform and operate writerbay orders automatically. This will help to place bids over the jobs according to your parameters. It can work for 24/7.
